text: Nguyen Van Troi (1947â€“1964) was a Vietnamese assassin. He was arrested and sentenced to death because he tried to kill United States Secretary of Defense Robert McNamara while he was visiting South Vietnam. He was glorified as a national hero. Nowadays, many streets in Vietnam are named after him. Category:Viet Cong Category:1947 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Assassins
title: Nguyen Van Troi
